description: Education Ecosystem describes itself as a project-based learning platform where developers can discover new technologies and try them out hands-on using free practical project examples. Viewers reportedly use practical projects to learn how to build products from the fields of artificial intelligence, cryptocurrencies, game development, cybersecurity, data analytics, and programming. Ecosystem participants (such as viewers, project creators, site moderators, and API developers) are rewarded with LEDU tokens for positive activities in the ecosystem. Find out more at https://ledu.education-ecosystem.com/
name: Education Ecosystem
notice: LEDU token is undergoing a swap. Trading across exchanges has been halted for now. For more details, please click [here.](https://ledu.education-ecosystem.com/blog/ledu-token-swap-ledu-tokens-on-gate-to-be-excluded/)
